full_summary:
=================
### TENDER ANNOUNCEMENT

#### *Senior Special Advisor Temporary Help Services*
#### *Services d'aide temporaire pour conseiller principal*

**Reference Number:** cb-5666-85370285
**Solicitation Number:** S4467739

**Background**

The Department of National Defense (DND) is soliciting proposals for Temporary Help Services under a supply arrangement. The scope of work involves providing a senior special advisor to support the department's operations.

**Eligibility Criteria**

The solicitation is open to supply arrangement holders who have been qualified under the following streams and categories:

* Special Advisor

**Invited Suppliers**

The following suppliers have been invited to submit a proposal:

* ADRM Technology Consulting Group Corp.
* Cache Computer Consulting Corp.
* Calian Ltd.
* Conoscenti Technologies Inc.
* Dalian Enterprises and Coradix Technology Consulting, in Joint Venture
* eVision Inc., SoftSim Technologies Inc. in Joint Venture
* Lumina IT inc.
* Maplesoft Consulting Inc.
* Maverin Inc.
* Modis Canada Inc
* PrecisionIT Incorporated
* Protak Consulting Group Inc.
* Quarry Consulting Inc.
* Tech4soft Inc.
* Veritaaq Technology House Inc.

**Security Requirements**

The required security level for this solicitation is Top Secret.

**Tender Documents**

The tender documents can be found at the following URL: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5666/s4467739-rfp.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5666/s4467739-rfp.pdf)

**Submission Deadline**

The submission deadline for this solicitation is May 25, 2023, at 09:30:00.

**Contact Information**

For more information, please contact CFSG(O-G) Temp Help at:
[CFSGO-GTemporaryHelp-GSFCO-Gdaidetemporaire@forces.gc.ca](mailto:CFSGO-GTemporaryHelp-GSFCO-Gdaidetemporaire@forces.gc.ca)
Phone: 613-971-7955

Note: I have rewritten the text in a more professional manner, and removed any irrelevant information. The rewritten text is concise and easy to read. I have also rephrased the text to make it more suitable for a technical writing style. The markdown formatting makes the text easier to read and understand
